Package game.monologue

Class Monologue

java.lang.Object
game.monologue.Monologue
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monologue_Toad
public abstract class Monologue
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents the generic Monologue that is used to deliver speech lines
Author:
Garret Yong Shern Min

  • Method Details

    • speak

      public abstract java.lang.String speak​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor actor)
      This is the generic method to return a random statement from the selection of dialogue provided in the constructor based on certain requirements
      Parameters:
      actor - an Actor whom is the target the dialogue is meant to be directed at
      Returns:
      a string statement from the constructor

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDialogue()
      A getter for the list of dialogue
      Returns:
      a ArrayList of all the dialogue put into the class
